name: CYP1A2 inhibition can increase exposure of CYP1A2 substrates
actions: Avoid or use caution when combining CYP1A2 inhibitors with sensitive substrates.
Monitor for excessive sedation, hypotension, or other toxicity depending on the substrate.

rationale: Reduced clearance may increase systemic exposure and adverse effects.

explanation_template: {B_name} inhibits CYP1A2 and {A_name} is a CYP1A2 substrate. This may increase {A_name} exposure and toxicity risk.

references.citation: CYP inhibition can increase exposure of CYP substrates; clinical impact varies by substrate sensitivity.
